metadata.title: CVE-2024-9403 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 130. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 131 and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
